description: A zxAnCpeVersionUpdateTrap trap is sent when the
version of Remote Unit software was updated.

event.Summary: Remote unit software version update is $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdated ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusServiceType s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusEquipType s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusFileName s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusResult i 1 ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusFailReason i 1 ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusSource i 1 ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusTaskName s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusCurrVersion s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusLastVersion s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusModifyTime s EXAMPLEE ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusFileLocation i 1

description: The Remote Unit service type such as 'GPON', 'EPON', 'ADSL2'
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusServiceType

description: The Remote Unit equipment type such as 'F620', 'D420', 'F622' etc.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusEquipType

description: The result status of updating version.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusResult

description: The failure reason of updating version.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusFailReason

description: It includes two ways, one is task updating, the other is
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusSource

description: When zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusSource is 'task' requires this attribute.
size of the attribute is zero.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusTaskName

description: This attribute identifies the now version of the software.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusCurrVersion

description: This attribute identifies the old version of the software.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusLastVersion

description: The format is yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS.For example
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusModifyTime

description: Location type is defined as following:
2: file comes from remote FTP server.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-REMOTE-UNIT-SW-MIB::zxAnRuSwUpdateStatusFileLocation
